vuba.hsv¶

vuba.hsv(frame)[source]¶

Convert a frame to HSV format.

Parameters

frame (ndarray) – Frame to convert.

Returns

frame – Frame of HSV format.

Return type

ndarray

Raises

ValueError – If the supplied image is not of BGR format.

See also

gray, bgr
